<a href="https://www.gitbook.com/?utm_source=content&amp;utm_medium=trademark&amp;utm_campaign=-MkP23pBP3MWkIzJcreW" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1uwl36a r-z2wwpe r-1rasi3h r-1loqt21 r-18u37iz r-1fdo3w0 r-1mnahxq r-ymttw5 r-5njf8e r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-eu3ka r-1aockid" /></a>

Powered By <span class="css-901oao css-16my406 r-b88u0q">GitBook</span>

What are Design Systems?

A design system is a comprehensive recipe of the user-facing elements that will make up a product.

# 

<span key="1c2770df90bf40088456e638c19db990"><span offset-key="1c2770df90bf40088456e638c19db990:0">What are Design Systems?</span></span>

<span key="ea8356f2cc8846cfa4b55fed5f45d442"><span offset-key="ea8356f2cc8846cfa4b55fed5f45d442:0">A </span>**design system**<span offset-key="ea8356f2cc8846cfa4b55fed5f45d442:2"> is a comprehensive recipe of the user-facing elements that will make up a product.</span></span>

<span key="804d37ecbf1f40a2a55d519c5f3775aa"><span offset-key="804d37ecbf1f40a2a55d519c5f3775aa:0">You can think of a design system as a </span>**single source of truth**<span offset-key="804d37ecbf1f40a2a55d519c5f3775aa:2"> for all the design-related things that go into designing and building a product.</span></span>

<span key="78533797589a44b3ab0c072638ded367"><span offset-key="78533797589a44b3ab0c072638ded367:0">At the core, a design system will contain </span>**definitions of components**<span offset-key="78533797589a44b3ab0c072638ded367:2"> (technical documentation) and information on </span>**how those components will be used**<span offset-key="78533797589a44b3ab0c072638ded367:4"> (functional documentation).</span></span>

<span key="37d4bccdf2be464a8db185cccb0a2123"><span offset-key="37d4bccdf2be464a8db185cccb0a2123:0">A design system can include a one or more design languages, style guides, and pattern libraries.</span></span>

<span key="70f2295473704149af8bb51811902618"><span offset-key="70f2295473704149af8bb51811902618:0">It can also include things like:</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="5a95344cf2bc4d10af442d309995f8b8"><span offset-key="5a95344cf2bc4d10af442d309995f8b8:0">brand/identity standards</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="67d100daff454aa1830e6b6031e460af"><span offset-key="67d100daff454aa1830e6b6031e460af:0">values</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="b47b431c06b443668c0599e608bcc62a"><span offset-key="b47b431c06b443668c0599e608bcc62a:0">objectives</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="ce42fc2ac0c44d3da326497268c7067a"><span offset-key="ce42fc2ac0c44d3da326497268c7067a:0">best practices for accessibility</span></span>

<span key="0862f01e4c57461eae5100e3e3630544"><span offset-key="0862f01e4c57461eae5100e3e3630544:0">Why use design systems? Glad you asked! Read on to find out ðŸ™‚</span></span>

# 

<span key="ce6560826699434faed51a2ceb169f53"><span offset-key="ce6560826699434faed51a2ceb169f53:0">Why Use Design Systems?</span></span>

<span key="38eba9f94bd24d27893c5c83f548becf"><span offset-key="38eba9f94bd24d27893c5c83f548becf:0">Design systems are used to make sure there's one set of standard elements used everywhere, and everyone knows how to use them.</span></span>

## 

<span key="87b995184d6945c6a3c52a8c486da8a5"><span offset-key="87b995184d6945c6a3c52a8c486da8a5:0">Benefits of Design Systems</span></span>

<span key="570402cb9ff64f8a93ae11147e18ac26"><span offset-key="570402cb9ff64f8a93ae11147e18ac26:0">Here are some big benefits of using a design system for your product.</span></span>

### 

<span key="164c7b6472264b5dac690f8a548c458a"><span offset-key="164c7b6472264b5dac690f8a548c458a:0">Quality</span></span>

<span key="5d115ac3ee2f4fdb87abc2fdbb4f2a96"><span offset-key="5d115ac3ee2f4fdb87abc2fdbb4f2a96:0">The team alignment around design practices and the consistent use of elements and interactions across your product often leads to </span>**better products**<span offset-key="5d115ac3ee2f4fdb87abc2fdbb4f2a96:2">. That's because design systems themselves incorporate the unity principle of design, and allow us to define approaches to consistently leveraging the other principles of design throughout our product.</span></span>

### 

<span key="2254cf68af484acf8a32e55bcc09eab9"><span offset-key="2254cf68af484acf8a32e55bcc09eab9:0">Speed</span></span>

<span key="a65e7f542afd488ca62d4877b7cfceb0"><span offset-key="a65e7f542afd488ca62d4877b7cfceb0:0">Once you've assembled the framework of a design system, it's often </span>**faster to build your product**<span offset-key="a65e7f542afd488ca62d4877b7cfceb0:2">. That's because the team has:</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="a0d59e8611bb40cf9e8f456a87454b4c"><span offset-key="a0d59e8611bb40cf9e8f456a87454b4c:0">a library of modular, reusable components to draw from and deploy.</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="192349c54dcd4d78aa0bb23fc028a752"><span offset-key="192349c54dcd4d78aa0bb23fc028a752:0">a shared understanding of design decisions, so it's easy to understand how to implement components in context.</span></span>

### 

<span key="cb529a91cd2c42dd9f79fecf1e3a74f8"><span offset-key="cb529a91cd2c42dd9f79fecf1e3a74f8:0">Scalability</span></span>

<span key="f18a154f3e2345f9b87a2d5f6ade333c"><span offset-key="f18a154f3e2345f9b87a2d5f6ade333c:0">A clear, consistent, and well-documented design system means there's less technical debt in your product's codebase. This often makes products </span>**easier to maintain and scale**<span offset-key="f18a154f3e2345f9b87a2d5f6ade333c:2">.</span></span>

### 

<span key="b2a2ada1f0a5459bbb0243da25af3806"><span offset-key="b2a2ada1f0a5459bbb0243da25af3806:0">Iteration</span></span>

<span key="ac009812308f4ba0923a188a4e732f25"><span offset-key="ac009812308f4ba0923a188a4e732f25:0">Not having to focus as much time on building, quality assurance, and maintenance means your team can </span>**focus on building new features**<span offset-key="ac009812308f4ba0923a188a4e732f25:2"> for your product. In many contexts, rapid iteration is a critical contributor to market success.</span></span>

## 

<span key="0be080aaf2fb498cafa0e7aa01edf838"><span offset-key="0be080aaf2fb498cafa0e7aa01edf838:0">Industry Example: Shopify</span></span>

<span key="e0c723e8f2af400ba652d18e369e6577"><span offset-key="e0c723e8f2af400ba652d18e369e6577:0">Check out </span></span><a href="https://polaris.shopify.com" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="b5bca96d760845fe8702c6986cd09749" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-8022_259-8023-237__"><span data-key="0e78902a55b841a2929bb83c1d10e684"><span data-offset-key="0e78902a55b841a2929bb83c1d10e684:0">Shopify's design system (Links to an external site.)</span></span></span></a><span key="133a8f3ae66b47539596da5763951570"><span offset-key="133a8f3ae66b47539596da5763951570:0"> for an example from the industry.</span></span>

# 

<span key="7f2fa89c1b8f4849a043e73f759ac529"><span offset-key="7f2fa89c1b8f4849a043e73f759ac529:0">Design Languages</span></span>

## 

<span key="e21251a705a5401b925bf4622ce90810"><span offset-key="e21251a705a5401b925bf4622ce90810:0">What's a Design Language?</span></span>

<span key="df7280fe74134a608aff9e519e042b72"><span offset-key="df7280fe74134a608aff9e519e042b72:0">A </span>**design language**<span offset-key="df7280fe74134a608aff9e519e042b72:2"> is a </span>**definition of a style**<span offset-key="df7280fe74134a608aff9e519e042b72:4"> to drive design for a product or brand. It sets a standard for how to adhere to the style in things like the use of fonts, colors, and patterns.</span></span>

<span key="381dc600381546b0aec4167bbadf5817"><span offset-key="381dc600381546b0aec4167bbadf5817:0">Establishing a design language aligns a team on </span>**how to use components and style those components**<span offset-key="381dc600381546b0aec4167bbadf5817:2"> to achieve product goals in a consistent way, and it usually motivates </span>**why design decisions were made**<span offset-key="381dc600381546b0aec4167bbadf5817:4">.</span></span>

<span key="33b825f2b9764e0ba60cc9560fead087"><span offset-key="33b825f2b9764e0ba60cc9560fead087:0">Design languages often include style guides and documentation.</span></span>

## 

<span key="00b59d18fae3451f904f33973b1444e7"><span offset-key="00b59d18fae3451f904f33973b1444e7:0">Industry Example: IBM</span></span>

<span key="c61b95adcbd24309b5152f6587c17787"><span offset-key="c61b95adcbd24309b5152f6587c17787:0">Check out </span></span><a href="https://www.ibm.com/design/language/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="5265f5e935004c92b0781e379190895f" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-8022_259-8023-237__"><span data-key="97011b2960004016abc65b5b4459e4fa"><span data-offset-key="97011b2960004016abc65b5b4459e4fa:0">IBM's design language (Links to an external site.)</span></span></span></a><span key="b3612937db504019aa3881b55bb2e90a"><span offset-key="b3612937db504019aa3881b55bb2e90a:0"> for an example from the industry. It contains everything from the use of typography and color, to data visualization and layout, to the </span></span><a href="https://www.ibm.com/design/language/philosophy/pov" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="f5df5680237049d7a05b597550b42ee8" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-8022_259-8023-237__"><span data-key="a69cb3209dac46629473580f1d774e1e"><span data-offset-key="a69cb3209dac46629473580f1d774e1e:0">philosophy (Links to an external site.)</span></span></span></a><span key="11e168fffa614f688f33129b8f305a55"><span offset-key="11e168fffa614f688f33129b8f305a55:0"> behind </span></span><a href="https://www.ibm.com/design/language/philosophy/principles" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="4ba741f7670d4453aee76560ed9b4a64" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-8022_259-8023-237__"><span data-key="ded8b38c45d344c8ae55b59264a30f19"><span data-offset-key="ded8b38c45d344c8ae55b59264a30f19:0">the decisions they made (Links to an external site.)</span></span></span></a><span key="c685ab84966f459a99902823c20de961"><span offset-key="c685ab84966f459a99902823c20de961:0">.</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="98feefbc4fe149028c84d72594fb0fbf"><span offset-key="98feefbc4fe149028c84d72594fb0fbf:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">â€‹</span></span></span><a href="https://lambdaschool.instructure.com/courses/1562/modules" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="6c826b637ba146eea21aa30be662079e" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-8022_259-8023-237__"><span data-key="7ce6622dfd154a4991dbe4216fa15bde"><span data-offset-key="7ce6622dfd154a4991dbe4216fa15bde:0"> Modules</span></span></span></a><span key="0529319a8ca944e489bc2992018385f3"><span offset-key="0529319a8ca944e489bc2992018385f3:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">â€‹</span></span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="4d383f555bd040169ac636e5715014c7"><span offset-key="4d383f555bd040169ac636e5715014c7:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">â€‹</span></span></span><a href="https://lambdaschool.instructure.com/courses/1562/grades" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="f2e4716b77e34cc391567fb79a4b64c7" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-8022_259-8023-237__"><span data-key="52f28aa001eb443aab96a3f41674f9f2"><span data-offset-key="52f28aa001eb443aab96a3f41674f9f2:0">Grades</span></span></span></a><span key="35ba5af283024d1b9968a87684048ce1"><span offset-key="35ba5af283024d1b9968a87684048ce1:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">â€‹</span></span></span>

# 

<span key="eee4599a554940a3b33f47bf787f407d"><span offset-key="eee4599a554940a3b33f47bf787f407d:0">Pattern Libraries</span></span>

## 

<span key="3b4130427dcb43d794e6c43cf588ae26"><span offset-key="3b4130427dcb43d794e6c43cf588ae26:0">What's a Pattern Library?</span></span>

<span key="6f54067f69da460f9c12053bab6e0ce7"><span offset-key="6f54067f69da460f9c12053bab6e0ce7:0">A </span>**pattern library**<span offset-key="6f54067f69da460f9c12053bab6e0ce7:2"> or (</span>**component library**<span offset-key="6f54067f69da460f9c12053bab6e0ce7:4">) is a collection of components and design patterns that lay out how to implement the design language </span>**specifically for a user interface**<span offset-key="6f54067f69da460f9c12053bab6e0ce7:6">. These can be symbols and assets themselves, along with descriptions of when and how to use them.</span></span>

<span key="e01abc93ec23435f8e2f9480d343e79e"><span offset-key="e01abc93ec23435f8e2f9480d343e79e:0">A pattern library might include code snippets for components and documentation related to each. For example, an entry for a button component in React might describe what props are available to be passed in, such as color and values for button states.</span></span>

## 

<span key="2784ce89ff164c26a45d4d3d715c1788"><span offset-key="2784ce89ff164c26a45d4d3d715c1788:0">Industry Example: Ant Design</span></span>

<span key="b6318a9a3ff34596aa773b76600b54d8"><span offset-key="b6318a9a3ff34596aa773b76600b54d8:0"><span slate-zero-width="n">â€‹</span></span></span>

<span key="34f7749928b24972bf55f548ac7b8840"><span offset-key="34f7749928b24972bf55f548ac7b8840:0">Check out </span></span><a href="https://ant.design/docs/spec/overview" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="1c516eee400e422783a7ead48b59a568" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-8022_259-8023-237__"><span data-key="6d148f6753214b058153ee4ce086be0a"><span data-offset-key="6d148f6753214b058153ee4ce086be0a:0">Ant Design's pattern library (Links to an external site.)</span></span></span></a><span key="2f813604896345ad84ae4a43d31e9760"><span offset-key="2f813604896345ad84ae4a43d31e9760:0"> for an example from the industry. Notice how the pattern library fits in with the rest of their design documentation. Getting very familiar with the Ant Design docs will pay off in Labs!</span></span>

<span key="876b948d99e74de4891e4abd039342bb"><span offset-key="876b948d99e74de4891e4abd039342bb:0"><span slate-zero-width="n">â€‹</span></span></span>

<span key="6aa0d98ebf754bfa9ce9df445543e310"><span offset-key="6aa0d98ebf754bfa9ce9df445543e310:0"><span slate-zero-width="n">â€‹</span></span></span>

<a href="accessibility.html" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1awozwy r-14lw9ot r-190qawg r-z2wwpe r-rs99b7 r-4dj0k7 r-1loqt21 r-1quu1zo r-1ro0kt6 r-18u37iz r-16y2uox r-1wbh5a2 r-nsbfu8 r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"></a>

Industry Example: Ant Design
